channel.title: Games – Syntactically Correct
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: Gateway – Nice Puzzle Game
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: Gateway is a nice and cool puzzle where you kind of have to guess what to do in each room. I admit that I needed help at the light bulbs and colors room, but I enjoyed playing it very much.
item.content:encoded: Gateway is a nice and cool puzzle where you kind of have to guess what to do in each room. I admit that I needed help at the light bulbs and colors room, but I enjoyed playing it very much.

item.title: How to build the best paper airplane in the world
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: If you ever wanted to build a paper airplane that can really fly well, here are instructions (and even a video) explaining how to build the best paper airplane in the world. (via Lifehacker)
item.content:encoded: If you ever wanted to build a paper airplane that can really fly well, here are instructions (and even a video) explaining how to build the best paper airplane in the world. (via Lifehacker)

item.title: Today’s link-a-palooza
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: The weirdest Palm OS programs – a pretty funny list. (via Download Squad) Futurama returns for another season – WOOHOO!!! (via Slashdot) The Great Escape – Live role playing game in Madrid. Very high on the cool factor. (via Slashdot) Use GMail as a file viewer – good tip.
item.content:encoded:
• The weirdest Palm OS programs – a pretty funny list. (via Download Squad)
  • Futurama returns for another season – WOOHOO!!! (via Slashdot)
  • The Great Escape – Live role playing game in Madrid. Very high on the cool factor. (via Slashdot)
  • Use GMail as a file viewer – good tip.

item.title: Crimson Room
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: There are many online games where all you have to do is get out of a room, in which you’re trapped. Crimson Room is one of these games. Although sometimes frustrating, it’s a pretty good game. (via Download Squad)
item.content:encoded:
There are many online games where all you have to do is get out of a room, in which you’re trapped. Crimson Room is one of these games. Although sometimes frustrating, it’s a pretty good game.

(via Download Squad)

item.title: Brain Hotel
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: Brain Hotel is a nice online (and downloadable) adventure game. Enjoy. (via Download Squad)
item.content:encoded:
Brain Hotel is a nice online (and downloadable) adventure game. Enjoy.

(via Download Squad)

item.title: fastr
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
fastr is a very cool game, not unlike Guess-the-google. It shows you 10 images (from flickr) that have a common tag. You’re supposed to guess the tag before all 10 images appear. The faster you guess the tag, the more points you get. The nice thing about this game is that it is round-based (all …

Continue reading "fastr"
item.content:encoded:
fastr is a very cool game, not unlike Guess-the-google. It shows you 10 images (from flickr) that have a common tag. You’re supposed to guess the tag before all 10 images appear. The faster you guess the tag, the more points you get.

The nice thing about this game is that it is round-based (all online users of the game play at the same time) so you can see how other users are doing with the same challenges and compete with them.

item.title: Splash Back
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: Splash Back is a nice mind game where you have to inflate green bubbles until they pop and cause them to pop all other bubbles before you run out of inflation points. Enjoy. (via Download Squad)
item.content:encoded:
Splash Back is a nice mind game where you have to inflate green bubbles until they pop and cause them to pop all other bubbles before you run out of inflation points. Enjoy.

(via Download Squad)

item.title: Treasure Box
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: Treasure Box is one of those games that, like Samorost, have a kind of an semi-art feel to them. (via Digg)
item.content:encoded:
Treasure Box is one of those games that, like Samorost, have a kind of an semi-art feel to them.

(via Digg)

item.title: Puzzle Bobble
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: Just a quick link to an enjoyable old game, Puzzle Bobble. Enjoy.
item.content:encoded: Just a quick link to an enjoyable old game, Puzzle Bobble. Enjoy.

item.title: Tangram
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description: This time a mind game. In Tangram you’re supposed to put pieces together to match a shape, given to you by the game. I suck at this game, but you might like it. (via Download Squad)
item.content:encoded:
This time a mind game. In Tangram you’re supposed to put pieces together to match a shape, given to you by the game. I suck at this game, but you might like it.

(via Download Squad)
